I watched another great episod=
e tonight at the Villasca Axe Murder house and it was a good show, but....
=

It seems the main focus on their show is evp's and spirit communicat=
ion, which is preferred for my taste.=C2=A0 But they are using the sb7 ghos=
t box.=C2=A0 That is the worst box to use for spirit communication, it gets=
 poor reception and the sweep is horrible.=C2=A0 Any voices that could and =
do come through are drowned out by the unnecessary white noise incorporated=
 into the sweep.
=C2=A0
I would like to get in touch with them and give the=
m a quality ghost box to work with.
=C2=A0
So.....Does anybody know how i c=
an get a hold of these guys?
